name: Hide comments of YouTube videos
description:
This style hides the comment section of YouTube videos, as I personally find them distracting.

Dieser Style entfernt die Kommentare von YouTube-Videos, da ich sie arg ablenkend finde.

user.name: Janko Hoener
user.about: Creating a "style" every now and then to fix issues with certain websites. Please let me know if you notice any issues with my "styles" or if I can assist you in writing one. Thank you.
